title: Himi 339
lyrics:
M.NG,
1.
Fanongo, ‘oku hiva mai,
‘A e kau ‘āngelo,
Ko e fakaongo lelei,
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
2.
’I he lelei kuo hoko,
Kuo tau ongo’i,
‘A e hoko mai ‘a Sīsū,
Ko hotau Huhu’i.
3.
Ke hoko ‘a e ‘Otua,
Ko e tamasi’i;
Ko e toki me’a mana,
Ke tau vakai ki ai.
4.
Pea ke tau fakafeta’i,
Mo e kau ‘āngelo,
Pea fakaongo lelei,
‘A hotau ‘Otua.
5.
Kuo tupu ‘a e ‘Eiki
Ko Imanuela,
Ke tau fiefia lahi,
‘I he’etau ‘ilo.
6.
Ko hotau langomekina,
‘I he’etau hia,
Ke tau fai tapuekina,
Fakalaumālie.
7.
Pea ke tau kumi lahi,
Ke tau ‘ilo ia;
Ko hotau Fakamo’ui,
‘Oku anga ‘ofa. *
